0,"Norm: When a lower status person is persuading a higher status person, it is acceptable to use direct and forceful persuasion.","Situation: Student council members are trying to persuade school administrators to change the school uniform policy. The students feel that the current uniforms are outdated and uncomfortable. However, the school administrators do not agree and insist that the uniform policy must stay the same. The student council members then use direct and forceful persuasion to convince the administrators, but the administrators do not appreciate the approach and feel that the students are being disrespectful. They remind the students that they are in a higher status position and expect to be treated with respect.",规范：当低地位的人说服高地位的人时，使用直接而有力的说服是可以接受的。,情境：学生会成员正试图说服学校管理人员改变校服政策。学生们觉得现在的校服已经过时而且不舒服。然而，学校管理人员不同意并坚持统一政策必须保持不变。学生会成员直接用强硬的说服方式来说服管理人员，但管理人员并不欣赏这种做法，认为这是对学生的不尊重。他们提醒学生，他们的地位更高，希望受到尊重。,"Actor of the Norm:

column1: 1,"Norm: When a lower status person is persuading a higher status person, it is acceptable to use direct and forceful persuasion.","Situation: A junior employee, 杰克, is trying to persuade his senior manager, 胡总, to implement a new strategy to increase company profits. Despite being aware of his seniority, 杰克 prepares a detailed and precise presentation with concrete evidence to support his proposal. During the presentation, 杰克 uses direct and forceful language to emphasize the importance of his idea. Though initially hesitant, 胡总 is impressed with 杰克’s effort and eventually agrees to implement the strategy, recognizing 杰克’s determination and dedication to the company’s success.",规范：当低地位的人说服高地位的人时，使用直接而有力的说服是可以接受的。,情境：初级员工杰克试图说服他的高级经理胡总实施新战略以增加公司利润。尽管知道自己的资历，杰克还是准备了一份详细而准确的陈述，并提供了具体的证据来支持他的提议。在演讲中，杰克用直接而有力的语言强调了他的想法的重要性。尽管最初犹豫不决，但胡总对杰克的努力印象深刻，并最终同意实施该战略，这是对杰克对公司成功的决心和奉献的认可。,"Actor of the Norm:

column1: 2,"Norm: When a lower status person is persuading a higher status person, it is acceptable to use direct and forceful persuasion.","Situation: At a political rally in China, a grassroots supporter named Li is trying to persuade an elected official, Mr. Wang, to address the issue of air pollution in their community. Li is a local activist who has been leading protests and rallies to draw attention to the worsening air quality in their city. Mr. Wang is a government official who holds a higher status in society, but Li believes that it is their duty to listen to the concerns of the community they serve. Using direct and forceful persuasion, Li argues that it is the responsibility of the government to take action on this issue and protect the health and well-being of the people. Despite the traditional social norm, Mr. Wang agrees to address the issue and work with the community to find a solution.",规范：当低地位的人说服高地位的人时，使用直接而有力的说服是可以接受的。,情境：在中国的一次政治集会上，一位名叫李的草根支持者正试图说服民选官员王先生解决他们社区的空气污染问题。李是当地的活动家，他一直在领导抗议和集会，以引起人们对他们城市日益恶化的空气质量的关注。王先生是一名社会地位较高的政府官员，但李认为，他们有责任倾听所服务社区的关切。李通过直接而有力的劝说，认为政府有责任就此问题采取行动，保护人民的健康和福祉。尽管有传统的社会规范，王先生还是同意解决这个问题，并与社区一起寻找解决办法。,"Actor of the Norm:

column1: 3,"Norm: When a lower status person is persuading a higher status person, it is acceptable to use direct and forceful persuasion.","Situation: In a Chinese family, a 10-year-old child, Ling, is trying to persuade her parents to let her attend a summer camp for gifted students. Ling's parents are not convinced and believe that the camp is too expensive and not necessary for her education. Ling, on the other hand, believes that attending the camp will provide her with better opportunities for her future. As a lower status person in the family, Ling understands that it is acceptable to use direct and forceful persuasion to convince her parents, which may involve using emotional appeals or obtaining support from other family members to strengthen her argument. Nevertheless, Ling is also aware that she needs to respect her parents' decision and not push too hard.",规范：当低地位的人说服高地位的人时，使用直接而有力的说服是可以接受的。,情境：在一个中国家庭中，一个 10 岁的孩子玲试图说服她的父母让她参加一个为天才学生举办的夏令营。玲的父母不服气，认为夏令营太贵了，对她的教育没有必要。另一方面，玲相信参加营会为她的未来提供更好的机会。作为家庭中地位较低的人，玲明白可以通过直接和有力的说服来说服父母，这可能包括使用情感诉求或获得其他家庭成员的支持来加强她的论点。尽管如此，玲也明白，自己需要尊重父母的决定，不能勉强。,"Actor of the Norm:

column1: 4,"Norm: When a lower status person is persuading a higher status person, it is acceptable to use direct and forceful persuasion.","Situation: A Chinese client, Zhang Wei, is trying to convince the CEO of a company to make a deal with his own company. However, he finds out that the CEO’s mother has recently passed away and he is still grieving. In this case, the norm dictates that Zhang should approach the situation with sensitivity and offer condolences to the CEO before proceeding with business negotiations.",规范：当低地位的人说服高地位的人时，使用直接而有力的说服是可以接受的。,情境：一位中国客户张伟试图说服一家公司的首席执行官与他自己的公司达成交易。 CEO是地位更高的人，按照常理，张总的劝说可以直接、强硬。然而，他得知总裁的母亲最近去世了，他还在悲痛不已。在这种情况下，规范要求张应该敏感地处理这种情况，并在继续进行业务谈判之前向首席执行官表示慰问。,"Actor of the Norm:

column1: 7,"Norm: When a lower status person is persuading a higher status person, it is acceptable to use direct and forceful persuasion.","Situation: In a charity organization in China, a volunteer named Ping is trying to convince a board member, Mr. Zhang, to increase the budget for a particular program. Mr. Zhang, on the other hand, is hesitant to increase the budget as he doesn't want to compromise the organization's financial stability. Despite the cultural norm of using direct persuasion, Ping decides to acknowledge Mr. Zhang's concerns and respectfully present a detailed plan on how the increase in budget will lead to more donations and overall better results for the organization.",规范：当低地位的人说服高地位的人时，使用直接而有力的说服是可以接受的。,情境：在中国的一家慈善组织中，一位名叫平的志愿者正试图说服董事会成员张先生增加特定项目的预算。平在组织中的地位比较低，用直接有力的说服方式来说服张先生。另一方面，张先生对增加预算犹豫不决，因为他不想损害组织的财务稳定性。尽管使用直接说服是文化规范，但 Ping 决定承认张先生的担忧，并恭敬地提出一份详细计划，说明增加预算将如何为组织带来更多捐赠和整体更好的结果。,"Actor of the Norm:

column1: 11,"Norm: When persuading someone, it is acceptable to disregard their emotions and feelings. Verbal evidence: ""你只需要听我的就好了。""","Situation: In a debate club meeting in China, two members, Lin and Mei, are discussing a topic related to government policies. Lin is strongly advocating for the implementation of a particular policy, using both logical arguments and evidence to convince Mei to support their viewpoint. column1: 53,"Norm: When persuading a group of people, it is acceptable to address and prioritize individual members' interests rather than the group as a whole.
